subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Oscar De La Hoya, who won an Olympic gold medal and became a champion in six weight divisions while winning 10 world titles, was inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame in Canastota, N.Y.
snippet: Oscar De La Hoya, who won an Olympic gold medal and became a champion in six weight divisions while winning 10 world titles, was inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame in Canastota, N.Y.
